title: Aquarion Evol
description: The story will take place 12,000 years after the first Aquarion television series at a city modeled after Hong Kong. A new cast of characters, piloting a new Aquarion robot, will fight enemies from another dimension.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Mecha>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> Sci-Fi>]
